column4: What is the default key to scroll up/down in a screen in ubuntu?
the normal keys used are the up and down arrows? Just like windows.
when i'm in... well, mid sentence i decided  to double check and it works :S, thanks!
:) If you are using a IRC client though, the up and down arrows actually select the lines that you already posted. Additionally, you can use the page up and page down keys for greater distances
